thread.title: Dumelo to launch new game app
thread.title_full: Dumelo to launch new game app

title: Dumelo to launch new game app
text:
Source: Ghana | Hitz FM | Anita Ampomah Date: 14-10-2015 Time: 08:10:35:pm John Dumelo 
Ghanaian actor, John Dumelo is set to unveil a new mobile game application for android and Apple (iOS) phones. 
The game which is called ‘Aya’ centres on the main character, John Dumelo, trying to rescue a loved one who has been captured by an evil villain. 
The game will be officially launched in April 2016 and it has several scenes from several parts of Accra, Nigeria and other parts of Africa. 
According to the 31-year–old actor, who was speaking in an interview with Hitz at 1, it took him a lot of time and effort to develop such game. 
“It’s taken a lot of time to build this game which will be released in April,” he said. 
He said ‘Aya’, which is a female name, is for both young and old. 
“Aya is just the name of a girl and the game is not for kids alone but adults too,” he explained. 
“It about time we do other stuff that can also fetch us money,” the award winning actor added.
